title: Sanders blasts Trump on 'authoritarianism' for sending troops to LA
shortDescription: Bernie Sanders' comments come after Trump deployed 2,000 National Guard troops to help quell immigration protests in Los Angeles.

title: Trump orders National Guard to LA
shortDescription: President Trump ordered 2,000 National Guard troops to Los Angeles to combat violent protesters opposed to immigration enforcement.

title: Why did Trump deploy National Guard to LA protests? What to know about tense clashes
shortDescription: President Donald Trump orders the National Guard to quell protests against immigration enforcement in Los Angeles.

title: Donald Trump says Kilmar Abrego Garcia's return to US 'wasn't my decision'
shortDescription: Donald Trump said he didn’t speak with Salvadoran President Nayib Bukele about Kilmar Abrego Garcia’s return to the United States.

title: Trump claims new wartime powers to step up immigration crackdown
shortDescription: Trump has packed detention centers with immigrants and is sending the National Guard troops to LA to crack down on those protesting the detentions.

title: Trump threatens 'serious consequences' if Elon Musk backs GOP rivals
shortDescription: Trump threatened 'very serious consequences' if Elon Musk finances challengers to Republicans who support his legislative priorities.

title: Trump orders troops to LA to combat violent immigration protests
shortDescription: Trump ordered the National Guard to Los Angeles to quell concrete-hurling protesters opposed to tougher immigration enforcement.

title: Trump on deported Kilmar Abrego Garcia
shortDescription: President Trump spoke with reporters on Air Force One on the return of deported Kilmar Abrego Garcia.

title: GOP lawmaker slammed for 'hateful' post about congressional chaplain
shortDescription: Rep. Mary Miller, an Illinois Republican, said in a post on X that a Sikh chaplain should "never have been allowed" to lead prayer in Congress.

title: Proud Boys who stormed Capitol sue government for $100 million
shortDescription: Five members of the right-wing extremist group the Proud Boys who stormed the U.S. Capitol during the Jan. 6 insurrection are suing the government.

title: Trump's new travel rules hit families, tourists
shortDescription: South Florida, home to large Venezuelan, Haitian and Cuban communities, will be hit hard by Trump's travel ban

title: Trump's on a Supreme Court winning streak. Justice Jackson sees 'troubling message'
shortDescription: Supreme Court Justice Ketanji Brown Jackson questioned whether her colleagues are loosening its standards when intervening for the Trump administration.

title: Republican infighting fuels concern about Trump tax bill's chances
shortDescription: Disputes among Republicans about parts of Trump's major tax bill threaten approval in the Senate and past compromises reached by the GOP-led House.

title: Trump says ex-pal Elon Musk can keep golden White House key
shortDescription: Trump says he was serious about ending Elon Musk's government contracts —and would do so if he thought it was in the interest of the country.

title: Bannon prods Trump to cut off Musk: 'He crossed the Rubicon'
shortDescription: Steve Bannon has stoked the tension between Donald Trump and Elon Musk. The feud began when Musk pushed lawmakers to reject the president’s tax bill.

title: Supreme Court rejects GOP election-rule challenge in Pennsylvania
shortDescription: The Supreme Court passed up the chance to weigh in how much leeway state courts have to interpret federal election rules.

title: The post-fight fallout from Trump-Musk battle could get even uglier
shortDescription: The extraordinarily bitter and public breakup could have significant consequences for both the world's richest man and its most powerful.

title: In win for Trump, Supreme Court lets DOGE access Social Security data for now
shortDescription: DOGE wants access to the data of millions of Americans, including Social Security numbers, medical information, tax return data, citizenship records and more.
